title: Solana Telegram Trading Bot to Shut Down After Users Drained of $523K
description: Solareum is closing up shop after acknowledging an apparent exploit that impacted hundreds of Solana users last week.

title: Peter Schiff: Something Big Is Happening That Very Few Investors Are Prepared For
description: Economist and gold bug Peter Schiff has warned that something big is happening that very few investors are prepared for. “More importantly, governments and central banks are not prepared for it either,” he stressed. Schiff explained that Fed rate cuts will make the inflation problem worse. Peter Schiff’s Warnings Economist and gold bug Peter Schiff […]
